name: SCP: Enigma
description:
FACILITY LOG ACCESS: GRANTED | ARC SITE-48, ██████, 20██

SCP: Enigma is a game that aims to remake SCP: Unity, which is a remake of SCP: Containment Breach that was unfortunately canceled in early 2021.

There is a difference between this project and SCP: United.

SCP: United has chosen to take its own path and make its own style in remaking SCP: Containment Breach. This game's goal is to stick to the same style as SCP: Unity.

SCP: Enigma is not claiming to be the new SCP: Unity, we are remaking the game with the same style albeit with a few differences.

Everything shown here is early development and most likely will be changed later in development.
